## function

```{r}
na_x2na <- function (s, x = 0)
{
    sapply(s, function(y)
        ifelse(y %in% x, NA, y))
}

time_calc <-
  function(string) {
    time_w_d <- string %>%
      str_split("\\+") %>% unlist()  %>%
      as.numeric()
    time = time_w_d[1] * 7 + time_w_d[2]
    return(time)
  }
```

## 📌  Tidy Data


### 转换变量
```{r}
data_tidy <- 
  data %>%
  # 重新计算 BMI ==============================
  # 把标错单位的 cm 转成 m
  mutate(pregnancy_height = if_else(
    pregnancy_height >= 100,
    pregnancy_height / 100,
    pregnancy_height
  )) %>% 
  mutate(BMI = 
         cchsflow::bmi_fun(pregnancy_height, pregnancy_weight)) %>%
  select(-pregnancy_bmi, -pregnancy_height, -pregnancy_weight) %>%
  # PE 表型 ==============================
  mutate(total_diagnosis = str_c(principal_diagnosis, ", ", other_diagnostic)) %>% 
  # 提取重度轻度字样
  mutate(
  PE_LH_type = 
    total_diagnosis %>%
    str_extract("重度|轻度") 
  ) %>% 
  # NA + 先兆子痫|子痫前期 = 轻度 
  mutate(
    PE_LH_type = 
           if_else(is.na(PE_LH_type) & str_detect(total_diagnosis, "先兆子痫|子痫前期"),
                   "轻度",
                   PE_LH_type)
  ) %>% 
  # NA + 黑尔普综合征|胎儿生长发育迟缓 = 重度 
  mutate(
    PE_LH_type = 
           if_else(is.na(PE_LH_type) & str_detect(total_diagnosis, "黑尔普综合征|胎儿生长发育迟缓"),
                   "重度",
                   PE_LH_type)
    ) %>% 
  select(-principal_diagnosis, -other_diagnostic, -total_diagnosis) %>% 
  # 转换孕周为天 ==============================
  mutate(delivery_gestational_age = 
           if_else(str_detect(delivery_gestational_age, "\\+"), 
                   time_calc(delivery_gestational_age),
                   as.numeric(delivery_gestational_age) * 7)
         ) %>% 
  # 替代实验检查中的 0 为 缺失值 ==============================
  mutate_at(
    c(
      "alt",
      "ast",
      "alb",
      "tba",
      "ldh",
      "cr",
      "bun",
      "uric_acid",
      "aptt",
      "pt",
      "inr",
      "atiii",
      "dd",
      "fibrinogen",
      "plt"
    ),
    ~ na_x2na(., x = 0)
  ) %>% 
  # 变量类型 ==============================
  mutate(PE_LH_type = as_factor(PE_LH_type)) %>% 
  mutate(check_in_nicu = if_else(check_in_nicu == 0, "出院", "转科") %>% as.factor()) %>% 
  mutate(type = as_factor(type))  %>% 
  mutate(delivery_way = as_factor(delivery_way)) %>% 
  mutate(fgr = as_factor(fgr)) %>% 
  mutate(the_baby_weight = as.numeric(the_baby_weight)/1000) 
  
```

## Transform

## 一般线性模型的假设

1. 正态性: Y 变量要是正态分布 ✅   
2. 独立性: 样本间独立, 没有重复
3. 线性: Y 与 X 之间是线性的
4. 同方差性: 因变量的方差不随自变量的水平不同而变化 ✅

## 📌  想回答的问题

基本建模形式: Y ~ BMI + Age + 初产

###  PE 表型

1. 早发型PE、晚发型PE
2. 轻度PE、重度PE
3. 早发重度、晚发重度

#### 1. 早发型PE、晚发型PE
```{r}
data_tidy %>%
  glm(type ~ BMI, data = ., family = binomial) %>% 
  broom::tidy() %>% 
  .[2, ] 
```

#### 2. 轻度PE、重度PE

```{r}
data_tidy %>%
  glm(PE_LH_type ~ BMI, data = ., family = binomial) %>% 
  broom::tidy() %>% 
  .[2, ] 
```


#### 3.早发重度、晚发重度
```{r}
data_tidy %>%
  filter(PE_LH_type == "重度") %>% 
  glm(type ~ BMI, data = ., family = binomial) %>% 
  broom::tidy() %>% 
  .[2, ] 
```


### 妊娠结局

1. 孕周
2. 分娩方式
3. 出生体重
4. 小于胎龄儿
5. 入住 NICU
6. Apgar

```{r}
data_BMI_pregnancy <-
  data_tidy %>%
  mutate(BMI_group = if_else(BMI >= 30, "obesity", "no_obesity") %>% as.factor()) %>%
  select(
    c(
      "delivery_gestational_age",
      "delivery_way",
      "the_baby_weight",
      "check_in_nicu",
      "x1_minute_a_pgar_score",
      "x5_minute_a_pgar_score",
      "BMI_group"
    )
  )
data_BMI_pregnancy %>%
  write_csv("analysis/data/derived_data/妊娠结局_BMI.csv")
```

```{r}

ggpairs(
  data_BMI_pregnancy %>% filter(!is.na(BMI_group)),
  columns = 1:(ncol(data_BMI_pregnancy) - 1),
  mapping = aes(colour = BMI_group)
)

```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_light())
# with fill ==============================
data_BMI_pregnancy %>%
  filter(!is.na(BMI_group)) %>% 
  {bind_cols(select_if(., is.numeric),
             select_at(., "BMI_group"))
  } %>%
  gather(-BMI_group, key = "var", value = "value") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = value, fill = BMI_group)) + 
  geom_density() +
  facet_wrap(~ var, scales = "free") 
```


### 在重度 PE 中, 器官功能损伤

1. 肝功能损伤
2. 肾功能损伤
3. PLT 减少
4. HLD 升高
5. 低蛋白血症

```{r}
data_tidy %>% 
  filter(PE_LH_type == "重度") %>% 
  mutate(BMI_group = if_else(BMI>= 30, "obesity", "no_obesity") %>% as.factor()) %>% 
  select(c("fgr","alt","ast","alb","tba","ldh","cr","bun","uric_acid","aptt","pt","inr","atiii","dd","fibrinogen","plt", "BMI_group")) %>% 
  write_csv("analysis/data/derived_data/重度 PE_器官功能_BMI.csv")
```


## 数据问题

1. 两张表格用合并表格, 重度 PE 是是合并表格的子集 ✅   
2. __age__ 和 __是否是初产妇__的变量没有
3. BMI 要重新计算, 有些单位搞错了, 单位是 M, 弄成 cm ✅   
4. FGA == FGR ✅   
5. PE 表型要用正则表达式进行提取 ✅   

## 几个小问题

1. 婴儿抢救次数: null 与 0 是一样吗? __是的__
2. 空白是缺失数据吗? __是的__
3. 婴儿转归中的 / 是什么意思? __缺失数据__
4. 孕前身高中的: 0 和小数 是什么意思? __0 是缺失, 小数是单位错误, m 写成 cm __
5. 孕前BMI 中的 0 与 0.00? 是什么意思 __数据缺失, 单位错误__
6. 肥胖中的 / 是什么意思 __缺失__
7. 实验室检查变量中的 0 是什么意思? __缺失__
